kastu Green Tea Moisturized Face Clean Mask Stick Facial Clean Mud Deep Cleanse Mask for All Skin Types
kastu
{'Brand': 'kastu', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Hydrating,Cleansing,Provides Vitamins', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 1.5 x 3.07 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '751474920263'}
I have very sensitive skin and this stuff is great. I have adult acne and break out with my cycle but since using this it hasn't been as bad and I am seeing a visual difference in my pores and this is the only change in my routine. Would recommend even to those with sensitive skin
Works great
YERMA Aloe Charcoal Blackhead Peel Off Face Mask with Aloe Vera Serum SKINCARE & Brush, Blackhead Remover 3-in-1 CLEAN SKIN SOLUTION SET - Exfoliating & Hydrating & Anti Aging Deep Cleansing for Dirt, Oil, Acne
Yerma
['[ALOE & CHARCOAL SERUM SET] - Peel of pack that contains deeply purifying Charcoal Powder and Aloe to provide moisture while removing sebum and dry skin cells without irritation. Soothing serum with Aloe which provides elasticity and protective layer on the skin, while making the skin smooth and moisturized. [DEEP CLEANSING MASK] - The powerful activated aloe charcoal face mask works strong and deeply to get rid of blackheads, impurities, dirt, acne and excess oil. After peel off mask apply the aloe ampoule serum to helps repairing & relaxing redness skin, mainly helps shrinking the large pores to make your face keep soft and smooth. [NATURAL ACTIVE INGREDIENT] - Our blackhead peel mask is made with aloe charcoal and aloe vera. Aloe charcoal have a good adsorption force, which can remove oil and blackheads. Aloe vera has a soothing and anti-inflammatory effect witch helps shrink pores. Mild and low- irritating help facial clean. [FOR ALL SKIN TYPES USE] - For Aloe charcoal clean peel off pack, apply an adequate amount to your skin, while avoiding the eye and mouth area. Peel gently after 30 min when the mask is completely dry. For Aloe Ampoule Serum, apply adequate amount over your face, then gently pat for better absorption. [100% SATISFACTION] - Please assure that we always stand behind our blackhead peel off mask. Should you for any reason be unhappy with your purchase, we provide you excellent customer support, please feel free to contact us. We will do our best to resolve your issues.']

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Skin Care & Hair Care Focus**: Prioritizes sensitive skin and adult acne in her skincare routine, while also exploring hair care, specifically looking for products that repair and strengthen damaged hair.
- **Effective Results & Critical Perspective**: Values products that deliver visible improvements; however, recent interactions indicate a more critical stance towards efficacy, especially after experiencing disappointing results in both skincare and hair care.
- **Natural Ingredients Preference**: Maintains a preference for natural or hydrating formulations in skincare and is likely to seek similar gentle options in hair care.
- **Routine Stability vs. Recent Variability**: Appreciates products that integrate smoothly into her regimen but shows signs of increased scrutiny regarding product responsiveness and performance, given recent mixed experiences.
- **Cautious Recommendation Approach**: Open to recommending products but opts for a balanced perspective, especially when results vary, reflecting a cautious approach to sharing opinions after recent disappointments.
- **Rating Pattern**: Rates products based on their effectiveness; while generally inclined to provide higher ratings for those that meet expectations, she is now more discerning and critical, particularly after encountering products that fell short of their promises.

Overall, the user continues to seek effective, gentle solutions for both skin and hair while demonstrating increased wariness and scrutiny in her evaluations of new products.
